description: An action that displays a search text field with dynamic proposals when selected. Add a listener on `selection` to implement the action. On `modify`, you may set a list of `proposals`.

proposals.description: The list of proposals to display.

text.description: The text in the search input field.

message.description: A hint text that is displayed when the search input is empty.

input.description: Fired when the search text has changed. The current query text will be given as the second parameter.

accept.description: Fired when a text input has been submitted by pressing the keyboard's search key. The current query text will be given as the second parameter.
